Desc.entry: A national cycling organisation with sixty thousand members, the local group having over eight hundred members. Organises around eighty events a year, mostly weekend rides ranging from very easy family rides on off road trails to easy rides for the inexperienced to all day Peak District rides. Arranges weekends away and takes part in National Cyclists Touring Club events. All members enjoy third party insurance and free legal representation. Males and females, all ages but children must be accompanied by an adult.
